newsitem.title: USA: PRESS DIGEST - New York Times front page - Sept 4.
newsitem.headline: PRESS DIGEST - New York Times front page - Sept 4.

text.p: The New York Times reported the following stories on its front page on Wednesday:
* United States prepares for further action against Iraq.
* United States takes sides in Kurdish dispute.
* Republican presidential candidate Bob Dole backs troops in Iraq raid.
* Dole is facing a tough sell in a California suburb of voters who can turn either way.
* Texas immigrants worry as cuts in welfare loom.
* The biggest mall in the United States imposes curfew on people under age 16, raising legal concerns.
* Choices are reshaping the U.S. school landscape.
